synopsis.text: In a world filled with sinister Nightmare Islands, children are kidnapped and forced to sign soul pacts with evil Nightmare soul pets who devour their souls. Protagonist Chu Mu suffers this fate after his clan is betrayed, but perseveres thanks to his bonded Moonlight Fox. Though they escape the island, greater struggles await as they journey towards their destiny. In this mystical world, soul pets of all kinds coexist alongside humans. Young soul pet master Chu Mu and his fox Mo Xie fight to survive in a harsh environment. Driven by fate, they grow in strength while overcoming adversaries and obstacles. Their epic adventure begins from the first time Chu Mu calls out, "Let me call you Mo Xie." On picturesque islands hiding dark secrets, children bond their souls to nightmarish pets simply to survive. Despite the odds, Chu Mu and his Moonlight Fox persevere through betrayal and exile. As destiny guides them towards greater trials, this duo chases revenge or domination by mastering the mysterious art of soul pets. Their mythic ascent begins with an outstretched hand and the words: "Let's call you Moye."
